query.sfwSql: SELECT SPEIT.*,SPIT.*,ORG.* ,ISNULL(SPEIT.UPDATE_SEQ,0) AS PAPIT_UPDATE_SEQ FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE SPEIT WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE SPIT WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPIT.PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID=SPEIT.PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION ORG WITH(NOLOCK) ON ORG.ORG_ID=SPEIT.VENDOR_ORG_ID WHERE SPEIT.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID=@PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID

Declare @GOLIVEDATE DATETIME SELECT TOP 1 @GOLIVEDATE = DATA1 FROM SGS_CODE_VALUE WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE CODE_ID = 52 and CODE_VALUE = 'GLDT'
DECLARE @PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID INT SELECT @PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID = PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID FROM SGT_PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE WHERE ITEM_TYPE_CODE = 'ITEM1'--ASK ONCE DECLARE @PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID_NON_TAXABLE INT SELECT @PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID_NON_TAXABLE = PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID FROM SGT_PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE WHERE ITEM_TYPE_CODE = 'ITEM2' DECLARE @EFFECTIVE_DATE DATETIME DECLARE @SCHEDULE_ID INT SELECT @EFFECTIVE_DATE = ACH_EFFECTIVE_DATE, @SCHEDULE_ID = PAYMENT_SCHEDULE_ID FROM SGT_PAYMENT_SCHEDULE WHERE PAYMENT_DATE = @PAYMENTDATE
SELECT PAPIT.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID, PAPIT.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID, PAPIT.PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID, CASE WHEN ISNULL(DIFF_AMOUNT,0) > 0 THEN PAPIT.AMOUNT-DIFF_AMOUNT ELSE PAPIT.AMOUNT END AS AMOUNT, --PIR 896 DIFF_AMOUNT INTO #NONTXBLAMT--NON TAXABLE TABLE FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE PAPIT INNER JOIN (
SELECT PHH.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID, PHD.PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID , PAYEE.NONTAXABLE_BEGINNING_BALANCE, SUM(PHD.AMOUNT) AS AMOUNT, CASE WHEN PAYEE.NONTAXABLE_BEGINNING_BALANCE <= 0 THEN 0 ELSE (PAYEE.NONTAXABLE_BEGINNING_BALANCE - SUM(PHD.AMOUNT)) END AS DIFF_AMOUNT, SUM(CASE WHEN PHH.PAYMENT_SCHEDULE_ID = @SCHEDULE_ID THEN PHD.AMOUNT ELSE 0 END) AS FTM_AMOUNT FROM SGT_PAYMENT_HISTORY_HEADER PHH INNER JOIN SGT_PAYMENT_HISTORY_DETAIL PHD ON PHH.PAYMENT_HISTORY_HEADER_ID = PHD.PAYMENT_HISTORY_HEADER_ID INNER JOIN SGT_PAYMENT_HISTORY_DISTRIBUTION SPHD ON PHH.PAYMENT_HISTORY_HEADER_ID = SPHD.PAYMENT_HISTORY_HEADER_ID AND SPHD.DISTRIBUTION_STATUS_VALUE NOT IN ('CDRE','CNLD','RCMD') --PIR 896 INNER JOIN SGT_PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE PIT ON PHD.PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID = PIT.PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID INNER JOIN (SELECT PA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID, CASE WHEN ISNULL(PA.NONTAXABLE_BEGINNING_BALANCE,0) > 0 THEN PA.NONTAXABLE_BEGINNING_BALANCE ELSE ISNULL(PA.REMAINING_NON_TAXABLE_FROM_CONVERSION,0) END AS NONTAXABLE_BEGINNING_BALANCE FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT PA INNER JOIN SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS PAS ON PAS.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = PA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID WHERE PAS.STATUS_VALUE NOT IN ('CNCL','CMPL') AND PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID = (SELECT TOP 1 PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS PAS1 (nolock) WHERE PAS1.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = PA.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID AND PAS1.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @PAYMENTDATE ORDER BY PAS1.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE DESC,PAS1.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_STATUS_ID DESC) AND PAS.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @PAYMENTDATE AND BENEFIT_BEGIN_DATE <= @PAYMENTDATE AND (BENEFIT_END_DATE IS NULL OR BENEFIT_END_DATE >= @PAYMENTDATE) ) AS PAYEE ON PAYEE.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = PHH.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID
WHERE PHH.PAYMENT_DATE <= @EFFECTIVE_DATE AND --PIR 896 PIT.PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID = @PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID_NON_TAXABLE -- NON TAXABLE AMOUNT AND PHH.PAYMENT_DATE> @GOLIVEDATE -- Conversion data ISSUE GO LIVE DATE Change GROUP BY PHH.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID,PHD.PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID,PAYEE.NONTAXABLE_BEGINNING_BALANCE HAVING (PAYEE.NONTAXABLE_BEGINNING_BALANCE - SUM(PHD.AMOUNT)) < --SUM(PHD.AMOUNT) --SUM(CASE WHEN PHDSH.TRANSACTION_DATE = @EFFECTIVE_DATE THEN PHD.AMOUNT ELSE 0 END) SUM(CASE WHEN PHH.PAYMENT_DATE = @PAYMENTDATE THEN PHD.AMOUNT ELSE 0 END) ) PAYMENTS ON PAPIT.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = PAYMENTS.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID AND PAPIT.PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID = PAYMENTS.PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID AND PAPIT.END_DATE IS NULL AND PAPIT.START_DATE <= @PAYMENTDATE --PIR 896 AND PAPIT.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID FROM TEMP_TABLE_FOR_PAYMENT)
SELECT PAPIT.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID, PAPIT.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID, PAPIT.PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID, PAPIT.AMOUNT,0 AS DIFF_AMOUNT INTO #TXBLAMT FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE PAPIT , #NONTXBLAMT NON WHERE PAPIT.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = NON.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID AND PAPIT.PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID = @PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID AND PAPIT.END_DATE IS NULL AND PAPIT.START_DATE <= @PAYMENTDATE--PIR 896
INSERT INTO #NONTXBLAMT SELECT * FROM #TXBLAMT
UPDATE A SET END_DATE = DATEADD(dd,-(DAY(DATEADD(mm,1,@PAYMENTDATE))),DATEADD(mm,1,@PAYMENTDATE)),MODIFIED_DATE=GETDATE() , MODIFIED_BY='OPUS Batch', UPDATE_SEQ = UPDATE_SEQ+1 FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE A INNER JOIN #NONTXBLAMT B ON A.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = B.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID AND A.PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID = B.PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID AND A.END_DATE IS NULL AND A.START_DATE <= @PAYMENTDATE
INSERT INTO SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE (PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID, PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, VENDOR_ORG_ID,AMOUNT,START_DATE,END_DATE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_DATE, UPDATE_SEQ) SELECT PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID , @PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID AS PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID , NULL AS ACCOUNT_NUMBER, NULL VENDOR_ORG_ID, SUM(AMOUNT) AS AMOUNT, DATEADD(dd,-(DAY(DATEADD(mm,1,@PAYMENTDATE))-1),DATEADD(mm,1,@PAYMENTDATE)) AS START_DATE, NULL AS END_DATE , 'OPUS Batch' AS CREATED_BY,GETDATE() AS CREATED_DATE,'OPUS Batch' AS MODIFIED_BY,GETDATE() AS MODIFIED_DATE,0 AS UPDATE_SEQ FROM #NONTXBLAMT GROUP BY PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID
INSERT INTO SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE (PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID, PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, VENDOR_ORG_ID,AMOUNT,START_DATE,END_DATE,CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_DATE, UPDATE_SEQ) SELECT PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID , PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID , NULL AS ACCOUNT_NUMBER, NULL VENDOR_ORG_ID, DIFF_AMOUNT AS AMOUNT, DATEADD(dd,-(DAY(DATEADD(mm,1,@PAYMENTDATE))-1),DATEADD(mm,1,@PAYMENTDATE)) AS START_DATE, NULL AS END_DATE , 'OPUS Batch' AS CREATED_BY,GETDATE() AS CREATED_DATE,'OPUS Batch' AS MODIFIED_BY,GETDATE() AS MODIFIED_DATE,0 AS UPDATE_SEQ FROM #NONTXBLAMT WHERE DIFF_AMOUNT > 0 AND PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID = @PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID_NON_TAXABLE --sELECT INTO TABLE Select * from SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT where PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID In( Select PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID from #TXBLAMT) DROP TABLE #NONTXBLAMT DROP TABLE #TXBLAMT
SELECT max(END_DATE) as END_DATE FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = @PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID AND END_DATE> = @LASTPAYMENTDATE

SELECT SUM(TAXABLE_AMOUNT)AS TAXABLE_AMOUNT ,SUM(NON_TAXABLE_AMOUNT) AS NON_TAXABLE_AMOUNT FROM ( select SUM(AMOUNT)AS TAXABLE_AMOUNT,NULL AS NON_TAXABLE_AMOUNT from SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE SPAPIT WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN SGT_PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE SPIT WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPAPIT.PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID = SPIT.PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID where PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = @PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID AND SPIT.ITEM_TYPE_DIRECTION = 1 AND SPIT.TAXABLE_ITEM_FLAG = 'Y' UNION select NULL AS TAXABLE_AMOUNT ,SUM(AMOUNT) AS NON_TAXABLE_AMOUNT from SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE SPAPIT WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN SGT_PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE SPIT WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPAPIT.PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID = SPIT.PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID where PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = @PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID AND SPIT.ITEM_TYPE_DIRECTION = 1 AND SPIT.TAXABLE_ITEM_FLAG <> 'Y' ) AS AMT

SELECT SUM(TAXABLE_AMOUNT)AS TAXABLE_AMOUNT ,SUM(NON_TAXABLE_AMOUNT) AS NON_TAXABLE_AMOUNT, PAYMENT_HISTORY_HEADER_ID, PAYMENT_DATE FROM ( SELECT SUM(AMOUNT) AS TAXABLE_AMOUNT,NULL AS NON_TAXABLE_AMOUNT, SPHD.PAYMENT_HISTORY_HEADER_ID, PAYMENT_DATE FROM SGT_PAYMENT_HISTORY_DETAIL SPHD WITH(NOLOCK) join SGT_PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE SPIT WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPHD.PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID = SPIT.PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID JOIN SGT_PAYMENT_HISTORY_HEADER SPHH WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPHD.PAYMENT_HISTORY_HEADER_ID = SPHH.PAYMENT_HISTORY_HEADER_ID join SGT_PAYMENT_HISTORY_DISTRIBUTION SPHDIS WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPHH.PAYMENT_HISTORY_HEADER_ID = SPHDIS.PAYMENT_HISTORY_HEADER_ID WHERE SPHD.PAYMENT_HISTORY_HEADER_ID IN (SELECT PAYMENT_HISTORY_HEADER_ID FROM SGT_PAYMENT_HISTORY_HEADER WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID=@PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID AND PERSON_ID= @PERSON_ID) AND SPHDIS.DISTRIBUTION_STATUS_VALUE IN ('OUTS','CLRD') AND SPIT.ITEM_TYPE_DIRECTION = 1 AND SPIT.TAXABLE_ITEM_FLAG = 'Y' GROUP BY SPHD.PAYMENT_HISTORY_HEADER_ID, PAYMENT_DATE UNION SELECT NULL AS TAXABLE_AMOUNT, SUM(AMOUNT) AS NON_TAXABLE_AMOUNT, SPHD.PAYMENT_HISTORY_HEADER_ID, PAYMENT_DATE FROM SGT_PAYMENT_HISTORY_DETAIL SPHD join SGT_PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE SPIT WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPHD.PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID = SPIT.PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID JOIN SGT_PAYMENT_HISTORY_HEADER SPHH WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPHD.PAYMENT_HISTORY_HEADER_ID = SPHH.PAYMENT_HISTORY_HEADER_ID join SGT_PAYMENT_HISTORY_DISTRIBUTION SPHDIS WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPHH.PAYMENT_HISTORY_HEADER_ID = SPHDIS.PAYMENT_HISTORY_HEADER_ID WHERE SPHD.PAYMENT_HISTORY_HEADER_ID IN (SELECT PAYMENT_HISTORY_HEADER_ID FROM SGT_PAYMENT_HISTORY_HEADER WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID=@PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID AND PERSON_ID= @PERSON_ID) AND SPHDIS.DISTRIBUTION_STATUS_VALUE IN ('OUTS','CLRD') AND SPIT.ITEM_TYPE_DIRECTION = 1 AND SPIT.TAXABLE_ITEM_FLAG <> 'Y' GROUP BY SPHD.PAYMENT_HISTORY_HEADER_ID, PAYMENT_DATE ) AS AMT GROUP BY PAYMENT_HISTORY_HEADER_ID, PAYMENT_DATE

SELECT SPEIT.*,SPIT.*,ORG.* ,ISNULL(SPEIT.UPDATE_SEQ,0) AS PAPIT_UPDATE_SEQ , TAXABLE_ITEM_FLAG FROM SGT_PAYEE_ACCOUNT_PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE SPEIT WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGT_PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE SPIT WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPIT.PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID=SPEIT.PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION ORG WITH(NOLOCK) ON ORG.ORG_ID=SPEIT.VENDOR_ORG_ID WHERE SPEIT.PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID = @PAYEE_ACCOUNT_ID and SPEIT.PAYMENT_ITEM_TYPE_ID in (1,2)
